content: {"Name": "Bread of Life Food Pantry", "Entity_Id": 2632, "Category": "Food Pantry", "Subcategory": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "Organization": "Poestenkill Evangelical Lutheran Church", "More_Information": "Any questions call (518) 283-6045 and leave your name and phone number.\r\nServes low-income individuals and families in and around the Poestenkill area.", "Counties": ["Rensselaer"], "Location": "Poestenkill Evangelical Lutheran Church", "Address": "776 Route 351", "City": "Poestenkill", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12140", "Phone": "518-283-6045", "Hours_of_Operation": "1st and 3rd Thursday 4:00pm-6:00pm", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "", "Website": "https://evangelicallutheranchurch.wordpress.com/food-pantry/", "Coalition": 0, "CFAN": 0, "Latitude": "42.68913742541533", "Longitude": "-73.56485082057708", "Last_Updated": "02-21-2024", "icon": "marker-F42000", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
